headline: Simon Property Group (NYSE:SPG) Expands National Outlet Shopping Day to Four Exciting Days
summary: Simon Property Group (NYSE:SPG) has recently expanded its National Outlet Shopping Day™ to four consecutive days, enhancing customer experiences with increased exclusive deals and participation from retailers. Amid this development, Simon’s shares moved in line with the flat market performance last week. Broader market sentiment was buoyed by benign inflation data and progress in U.S.-China trade talks, contributing to general market gains. Although Simon's event expansion is a significant...

headline: Simon Property (SPG) Up 0% Since Last Earnings Report: Can It Continue?
summary: Simon Property (SPG) reported earnings 30 days ago. What's next for the stock? We take a look at earnings estimates for some clues.

headline: National Outlet Shopping Day™ Expands to Four Days of Savings
summary: Simon®, a real estate investment trust engaged in the ownership of premier shopping, dining, entertainment and mixed-use destinations, today announced the expansion of National Outlet Shopping Day™ to four consecutive days, up from two days, running June 12 to June 15. It marks the longest run for the annual, one-of-a-kind shopping event since it began in 2022.
